```{r}
library(mclust)
data("diabetes")
```

```{r}
str(diabetes)
```

```{r}
X = diabetes[, -1]
dim(X)
```
```{r}
K = 3
res = Mclust(X, K)
```

```{r}
res$parameters$pro
```
```{r}
t(res$parameters$mean)
```
```{r}
tau = res$z
cl = apply(tau, 1, which.max)
# alternative
threshold = 0.6
tau_max = apply(tau, 1, max)
tau_threshold = tau[tau_max>threshold, ]
cl_threshold = apply(tau_threshold, 1, which.max)
```

```{r}
res = Mclust(X, G=1:18) # EM a tourn√© : 18*14 fois
plot(res, what="BIC")
```
